Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Furry \Fur"ry\, a. [From {Fur}.] 1. Covered with fur; dressed in fur. ``Furry nations.'' --Thomson. [1913 Webster]
2. Consisting of fur; as, furry spoils. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
3. Resembling fur. [1913 Webster]
furry adj : covered with a dense coat of fine silky hairs; "furred animals"; "a furry teddy bear" [syn: {furred}] [also: {furriest}, {furrier}]
